snippet: Local Afghan officials expressed alarm that the attack was led by the Haqqani network, an arm of the insurgency based in Pakistan....
abstract: Afghan officials say Taliban have overrun Jani Khel district in Paktia Province in southeast as fighters open up new front against Afghan security forces.

byline.contributor: Zahra Nader and Jawad Sukhanyar contributed reporting.

lead_paragraph: Local Afghan officials expressed alarm that the attack was led by the Haqqani network, an arm of the insurgency based in Pakistan.

headline.main: Taliban Overrun Afghan Border District, Opening a New Front
headline.print_headline: Taliban Open New Front by Taking Afghan District
